name: Creamy Penne Pasta Primavera
author: gretchen
summary: Asparagus, cherry tomatoes, and carrots are tossed in a delicious and rich cream sauce.
ingredients: 1 pound fresh asparagus, trimmed and cut into 2-inch pieces
1 clove garlic, minced, or more to taste
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil; add penne and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat-high heat; saute asparagus and carrots until tender yet firm to the bite, about 5 minutes
Add tomatoes and garlic; saute until garlic is fragrant, about 1 minute
Stir Parmesan cheese, cream, and black pepper into vegetable mixture until cheese melts and sauce is smooth, 2 to 3 minutes
Add pasta to sauce and toss to coat
